LanguageData.MD2.FissureChangeResourceDesc: Click to change which resource to produce
LanguageData.MD2.FillsFissureConfirm: Are you sure you wish to fill in this fissure?
LanguageData.MD2.FillsFissureBeginDesc: Click here to begin the drilling process once you have chosen your desired fissure size
LanguageData.MD2.FillsFissurePauseDesc: Click here to pause the drilling process
LanguageData.MD2.FillsFissureResumeDesc: Click here to resume the drilling process
LanguageData.MD2.ManufacturingManagerDesc: Opens the manufacturing manager user interface
LanguageData.MD2.ManufacturingCompleteAllInfo: Activating this will set the Assembly line to send down the completed products once all cycles of the order have been completed, or when it has completed 15 cycles. This helps reduce the number of incoming drops when the completion time of the recipe is very quick.
LanguageData.MD2.ManufacturingNoCompleteAll: Activating this will set the Assembly line to send down the completed products once all cycles of the order have been completed, or when it has completed 5 cycles. This helps reduce the number of incoming drops when the completion time of the recipe is very quick.
LanguageData.MD2.MechWallOpenEmbrasureDesc: Click to extend the wall into an embrasure
LanguageData.MD2.MechWallRecessWallDesc: Click to recess the wall into the ground
LanguageData.MD2.PowerNextToCoalPlant: Must be placed next to a coal burner
LanguageData.MD2.PowerNotFuelEnabledDesc: Click to stop this building from taking fuel
LanguageData.MD2.PowerNotFuelDisabledDesc: Click to this building to take fuel
